io.github.hhromic.uimr.stats

Interface Statistics<T extends Number>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleStatistics, LongStatistics

    public interface Statistics<T extends Number>
    This interface defines Statistics for Numbers.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Hugo Hromic
